verses.verse: And <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> took up his <S%H4912>parable<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>,
Oh <S%H5414>that<s%> I were as in the <S%H3391>months<s%> of <S%H6924>old<s%>, As in the <S%H3117>days<s%> when <S%H433>God<s%> watched over <S%H8104>me<s%>;
When his <S%H5216>lamp<s%> <S%H1984>shined<s%> upon my <S%H7218>head<s%>, And by his <S%H216>light<s%> I <S%H3212>walked<s%> through <S%H2822>darkness<s%>;
As I was in the <S%H2779>ripeness<s%> of my <S%H3117>days<s%>, When the <S%H5475>friendship<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> was upon my <S%H168>tent<s%>;
When the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> was yet with <S%H5288>me<s%>, And my children were about <S%H5439>me<s%>;
When my <S%H1978>steps<s%> were <S%H7364>washed<s%> with <S%H2529>butter<s%>, And the <S%H6697>rock<s%> poured me <S%H6694>out<s%> <S%H6388>streams<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%>!
When I went <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H8179>gate<s%> unto the <S%H7176>city<s%>, When I <S%H3559>prepared<s%> my <S%H4186>seat<s%> in the <S%H7339>street<s%>,
The young <S%H5288>men<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> me and <S%H2244>hid<s%> <S%H3453>themselves<s%>, And the aged rose <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%>;
The <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H6113>refrained<s%> from <S%H4405>talking<s%>, And <S%H7760>laid<s%> their <S%H3709>hand<s%> on their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>;
The <S%H2244>voice<s%> of the <S%H5057>nobles<s%> was <S%H6963>hushed<s%>, And their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1692>cleaved<s%> to the roof of their <S%H2441>mouth<s%>.
For when the <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H833>me<s%>, then it blessed <S%H5869>me<s%>; And when the eye <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H5749>me<s%>, it gave witness unto me:
Because I <S%H4422>delivered<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> that <S%H7768>cried<s%>, The <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> <S%H5826>also<s%>, that had none to help him.
The <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of him that was ready to <S%H6>perish<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> upon <S%H490>me<s%>; And I caused the widow's <S%H3820>heart<s%> to sing for <S%H7442>joy<s%>.
I <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, and it <S%H3847>clothed<s%> <S%H4941>me<s%>: My justice was as a <S%H4598>robe<s%> and a <S%H6797>diadem<s%>.
I was <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to the <S%H5787>blind<s%>, And <S%H7272>feet<s%> was I to the <S%H6455>lame<s%>.
I was a <S%H1>father<s%> to the <S%H34>needy<s%>: And the <S%H7379>cause<s%> of him that I <S%H3045>knew<s%> not I searched <S%H2713>out<s%>.
And I <S%H7665>brake<s%> the <S%H4973>jaws<s%> of the <S%H5767>unrighteous<s%>, And <S%H7993>plucked<s%> the <S%H2964>prey<s%> out of his <S%H8127>teeth<s%>.
Then I <S%H559>said<s%>, I shall <S%H1478>die<s%> in my <S%H7064>nest<s%>, And I shall <S%H7235>multiply<s%> my <S%H3117>days<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand<s%>:
My <S%H8328>root<s%> is spread <S%H6605>out<s%> to the <S%H4325>waters<s%>, And the <S%H2919>dew<s%> lieth all <S%H3885>night<s%> upon my <S%H7105>branch<s%>;
My <S%H3519>glory<s%> is <S%H2319>fresh<s%> in <S%H5978>me<s%>, And my <S%H7198>bow<s%> is <S%H2498>renewed<s%> in my <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
Unto me men gave <S%H8085>ear<s%>, and <S%H3176>waited<s%>, And kept <S%H1826>silence<s%> <S%H3926>for<s%> my <S%H6098>counsel<s%>.
After <S%H310><s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> they spake not <S%H8138>again<s%>; And my <S%H4405>speech<s%> distilled upon <S%H5197>them<s%>.
And they <S%H3176>waited<s%> for me as for the <S%H4306>rain<s%>; And they <S%H6473>opened<s%> their <S%H6310>mouth<s%> wide as for the latter <S%H4456>rain<s%>.
I <S%H7832>smiled<s%> on <S%H539>them<s%>, when they had no confidence; And the <S%H216>light<s%> of my <S%H6440>countenance<s%> they cast not <S%H5307>down<s%>.

I <S%H977>chose<s%> out their <S%H1870>way<s%>, and <S%H3427>sat<s%> as <S%H7218>chief<s%>, And <S%H7931>dwelt<s%> as a <S%H4428>king<s%> in the <S%H1416>army<s%>, As one that <S%H5162>comforteth<s%> the <S%H57>mourners<s%>.
